attributes.contentHtml:
bunch of errors with this thread.

  1. how do you know what I believe?
  2. I'm said to be a propaganda person. First of all no one controls me. If I wanted to leave I would. I'm sorry if you had a bad experience that is on you.
  3. I was not told to say anything.
  4. and finally you left out half of the story to manipulate this into your own twisted story of deception.
  5. I believe half of your arguments were misunderstandings.

For yall that don't know I'm red haired man.

Don't twist a story into something you don't know half of the details about. You don't know what I know and what I believe. Don't use me as a propaganda tool to push a narrative .

attributes.title: MarCloud - Marcelektro - Enzonet | The whole saga

attributes.contentHtml: unrushed whats the other half then
